cards.skill_disc: Last Words: During your next turn, double the attack and defense of each allied Dragoncraft follower that comes into play.

cards.description: A land's prosperity and fortune are not perforce coupled to the deeds of men. Of equal import are heaven's works, which guide the leaders and move the subjects.
cards.evo_description: She is there in conquest's shadow—at prosperity's side. She who counsels with her beating wings and illuminates the future with shimmering fires.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Randomly destroy 1 of the lowest-cost enemy followers.
cards.org_skill_disc: [b]Fanfare[/b][b]:[/b] Randomly destroy 1 of the lowest-cost enemy followers.
cards.description: Strong wind blowin' in? Omen for rough seas. Winds calm but the seas are rough? Omen for it. —Young fisherman
cards.evo_description: So big you'll hurt your neck tryin' to look up at it. And it makes these huge waves just by diving. Ain't no way we can get close to it. —Young fisherman

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the number of Dragoncraft cards in your hand.
cards.org_skill_disc: [b]Fanfare[/b][b]:[/b] Deal X damage to all other followers. X equals the number of Dragoncraft cards in your hand.
cards.description: "Just 'cause you touch a dragon's scales don't make it angry. They're furious all the time!" —Anonymous Journeyman
cards.evo_description: "Some say that touching a certain scale on a dragon will make 'em real mad. I say just don't touch any of 'em!" —Anonymous Journeyman

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Change your leader's maximum defense to 10. Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)

If no enemy followers are in play, deal 5 damage to the enemy leader instead. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
cards.description: Stunted weaklings, what have you done? What can you even do? Discard it all—each and every thing that binds you. Thirst for them—these wings, these scales, this roar.
cards.evo_description: You are weak, and so you fear the world. But the time for such feelings is through. Once the dragon's power marks you, the world will fear!

cards.skill_disc: At the start of your turn, summon a Windblast Dragon.
cards.org_skill_disc: At the start of your turn, summon a [b]Windblast Dragon[/b].
cards.description: The cacophony of roars shakes the heavens and the earth.

cards.description: Where others take days to create a world, this dragon takes just an instant.
cards.evo_description: In order to create, one need only entrust their soul to the sea. In order to destroy, one need only summon a whirlpool to swallow the land. Everything comes from water, and one day everything will return there.

cards.description: The divine floods washed away every destiny, but from the mud rose a call. In that moment all incidence became inevitability. —Cyclical Histories, Chapter 2
cards.evo_description: The oracle that emerged from the mud will carry in its body everything from this world's beginning and end. Radiant, it will spin the fate of the world—creating all, destroying all. —Cyclical Histories, Chapter 5

cards.description: A depraved creature of evil, wickedness incarnate—from its mouths it expels one thousand curses and one million poisons. —Terrors of the World, Chapter 4
cards.evo_description: It is not blood, but venom that flows in its veins—not life, but malice inside its body. The three necked dark dragon is truly a terrible force not to be trifled with. —Terrors of the World, Chapter 4

cards.evo_description: A blaze of light and the heavens are covered. Will the creature bring forth the beginning of salvation or the end of sin?

cards.description: Its eyes are the color of madness, an angry shade filled with hatred for the skies above. Once a god itself, it has been twisted and deformed by its despair. Lo, the tears of this world exist because of the tears you shed. —Lost Legends
cards.evo_description: Its hatred of the gods becomes a raging sea, waves crashing into the skies above. Those hands that once loved the world transform into the jaws of a fearsome beast. Lo, the seas are violent because they know your anger. —Lost Legends
